name: Defend ME (Neverite)
description:
(sorry if it's bad this was made in Scratch)

Defend your enemy. Your life is on his hands. Kill your allies, and survive his shots.

In this bullet-heck like game you must defend your enemy to not lose.

Share your score in the comments! at the end of the Wowie Jam I will post the top 5 in my youtube channel (it's not that big but if you want i can shout you out) : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwkmFnWj4LCxxydxhhoj86w
